ClassDef.summary: Provides nested docking information for a .

Property.name: Alignment
Property.summary: Gets the edge of the target to dock.

Property.name: DisplayingAlignment
Property.summary: Gets the edge of the target to dock, when displaying.

Property.name: DisplayingPrevPane
Property.summary: Gets the target to dock, when displaying.
Property.value: A object that represents the target to dock, when displaying.

Property.name: DisplayingProportion
Property.summary: Gets the size for the nested docking, when displaying.
Property.value: A value between 0 and 1 to indicate the size for the nested docking.

Property.name: IsDisplaying
Property.summary: Gets the value to indicate if current is being displayed.
Property.value: true if current is being displayed, otherwise, false.

Property.name: LogicalBounds
Property.summary: Gets the logical location and size of the .
Property.value: The to represent the logical location and size of the .

Property.name: PaneBounds
Property.summary: Gets the actual location and size of the .
Property.value: The to represent the actual location and size of the .

Property.name: PrevPane
Property.summary: Gets the target Gets the target to dock.
Property.value: A object that represents the target to dock.

Property.name: Proportion
Property.summary: Gets the size for the nested docking.
Property.value: A value between 0 and 1 to indicate the size for the nested docking.

Property.name: SplitterBounds
Property.summary: Gets the location and size of the splitter.
Property.value: The to represent the location and size of the splitter.
